content.contentP: Mobile satellite communication system, as the first generation of self-developed and controllable mobile satellite communication system in China, is adopted of geostationary satellite and 109 land beams & 2 ocean beams of S band, covering land and peripheral ocean in China, the Indian Ocean and west Pacific Ocean.

Ground gateway station of mobile satellite communication system is employed with 3GPP-R6 structure, supporting on-line subscriber quantity at one million and maximum single-subscriber data rate at 384kbps.

The system supports voice, short-message, fax, video post back, data collection, network browse, trunk communication, etc., and has capability f connection and communication with PSTN, PLMN, Internet and other private network.
